actions.description: The githyanki makes three Longsword or Telekinetic Bolt attacks, or it makes one of those attacks and uses Spellcasting.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (8d6) force damage.
actions.name: Telekinetic Bolt

actions.description:
The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: light, mage hand (the hand is invisible), message

3/day each: fireball, invisibility, nondetection (self only)

1/day each: dimension door, plane shift, telekinesis
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
